s: There are so many choices for replacement water filters, and the OEM versions are priced too high. I have a new Sears Kenmore Elite that replaced a 2 year old Samsung refrigerator. The only positive feature of the Samsung was the water dispenser, but that's another review. I used this brand in the Samsung with good results for two years and decided to try these in the Kenmore Elite. So far no leaks, excellent taste and improved flow. The OEM LG ...
